verses.text: And the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* set \w forward|strong="H5265"\w*, and \w pitched|strong="H2583"\w* in the \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* on this \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \add by\add* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*.

¶ And \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zippor|strong="H6834"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* all that \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* had \w done|strong="H6213"\w* to the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*.

And \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* was \w sore|strong="H3966"\w* \w afraid|strong="H1481"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, because they \add were\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*: and \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* was \w distressed|strong="H6973"\w* because \w of|strong="H6440"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w*, Now shall this \w company|strong="H6951"\w* lick \w up|strong="H3897"\w* all \add that are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* us, as the \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* licketh \w up|strong="H3897"\w* the \w grass|strong="H3418"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*. And \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zippor|strong="H6834"\w* \add was\add* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Moabites|strong="H4124"\w* at that \w time|strong="H6256"\w*.

He \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w messengers|strong="H4397"\w* therefore unto \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Beor|strong="H1160"\w* to \w Pethor|strong="H6604"\w*, which \add is\add* by the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, to \w call|strong="H7121"\w* him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, there is a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* from \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: behold, they \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* the \w face|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and they \w abide|strong="H3427"\w* over \w against|strong="H4136"\w* me:\f + \fr 22.5 \ft face: Heb. eye\f*

\w Come|strong="H3212"\w* now therefore, I pray thee, \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* me this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; for they \add are\add* too \w mighty|strong="H6099"\w* for me: peradventure I shall \w prevail|strong="H3201"\w*, \add that\add* we may \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* them, and \add that\add* I may drive them \w out|strong="H1644"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: for I \w wot|strong="H3045"\w* that he whom thou \w blessest|strong="H1288"\w* \add is\add* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*, and he whom thou \w cursest|strong="H0779"\w* is \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w*.

And the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* and the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Midian|strong="H4080"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* with the rewards of \w divination|strong="H7081"\w* in their \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*; and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, and \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto him the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* of \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Lodge|strong="H3885"\w* here this \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and I will \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* you \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, as the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto me: and the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* with \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*.
And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \add are\add* these with thee?

And \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zippor|strong="H6834"\w*, \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, hath \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto me, \add saying\add*,

Behold, \add there is\add* a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, which \w covereth|strong="H3680"\w* the \w face|strong="H5869"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: \w come|strong="H3212"\w* now, \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* me them; peradventure I shall be \w able|strong="H3201"\w* to \w overcome|strong="H3898"\w* them, and drive them \w out|strong="H1644"\w*.\f + \fr 22.11 \ft I shall…: Heb. I shall prevail in fighting against him\f*

And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, Thou shalt not \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with them; thou shalt not \w curse|strong="H0779"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: for they \add are\add* \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w*.

And \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, \w Get|strong="H3212"\w* you into your \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w refuseth|strong="H3985"\w* to give me \w leave|strong="H5414"\w* to \w go|strong="H1980"\w* with you.

And the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, and they \w went|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w refuseth|strong="H3985"\w* to \w come|strong="H1980"\w* with us.
¶ And \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* yet \w again|strong="H3254"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w*, \w more|strong="H7227"\w*, and more \w honourable|strong="H3513"\w* than they.

And they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Zippor|strong="H6834"\w*, Let nothing, I pray thee, \w hinder|strong="H4513"\w* thee from \w coming|strong="H1980"\w* unto me:\f + \fr 22.16 \ft Let…: Heb. Be not thou hindered from, etc\f*

For I will \w promote|strong="H3513"\w* thee unto \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H3513"\w* \w honour|strong="H3513"\w*, and I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* whatsoever thou \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w* unto me: \w come|strong="H3212"\w* therefore, I pray thee, \w curse|strong="H6895"\w* me this \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

And \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, If \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* would \w give|strong="H5414"\w* me his \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w full|strong="H4393"\w* of \w silver|strong="H3701"\w* and \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, I \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* go \w beyond|strong="H5674"\w* the \w word|strong="H6310"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w less|strong="H6996"\w* or \w more|strong="H1419"\w*.

Now therefore, I pray you, \w tarry|strong="H3427"\w* ye also here this \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, that I may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* what the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w say|strong="H1696"\w* unto me \w more|strong="H3254"\w*.

And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* at \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, If the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w call|strong="H7121"\w* thee, rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \add and\add* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* with them; but \w yet|strong="H0389"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* which I shall \w say|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee, that shalt thou \w do|strong="H6213"\w*.

And \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* rose \w up|strong="H6965"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w saddled|strong="H2280"\w* his \w ass|strong="H0860"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*.

¶ And \w God’s|strong="H0430"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w* because he \w went|strong="H1980"\w*: and the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w stood|strong="H3320"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* for an \w adversary|strong="H7854"\w* against him. Now he was \w riding|strong="H7392"\w* upon his \w ass|strong="H0860"\w*, and his \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w servants|strong="H5288"\w* \add were\add* with him.

And the \w ass|strong="H0860"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w drawn|strong="H8025"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and the \w ass|strong="H0860"\w* turned \w aside|strong="H5186"\w* out of the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* into the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*: and \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w ass|strong="H0860"\w*, to \w turn|strong="H5186"\w* her into the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

But the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in a \w path|strong="H4934"\w* of the \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, a \w wall|strong="H1447"\w* \add being\add* on this side, and a \w wall|strong="H1447"\w* on that side.

And when the \w ass|strong="H0860"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, she \w thrust|strong="H3905"\w* herself unto the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, and \w crushed|strong="H3905"\w* \w Balaam’s|strong="H1109"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* against the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*: and he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* her \w again|strong="H3254"\w*.

And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w went|strong="H5674"\w* \w further|strong="H3254"\w*, and \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* in a \w narrow|strong="H6862"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, where \add was\add* no \w way|strong="H1870"\w* to \w turn|strong="H5186"\w* either to the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* or to the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

And when the \w ass|strong="H0860"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, she fell \w down|strong="H7257"\w* under \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*: and \w Balaam’s|strong="H1109"\w* \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* was \w kindled|strong="H2734"\w*, and he \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* the \w ass|strong="H0860"\w* with a \w staff|strong="H4731"\w*.

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* the \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w ass|strong="H0860"\w*, and she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, What have I \w done|strong="H6213"\w* unto thee, that thou hast \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* me these \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H7272"\w*?

And \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w ass|strong="H0860"\w*, Because thou hast \w mocked|strong="H5953"\w* me: I \w would|strong="H3863"\w* there \w were|strong="H3426"\w* a \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* in mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, for now would I \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* thee.

And the \w ass|strong="H0860"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, \add Am\add* not I thine \w ass|strong="H0860"\w*, upon which thou hast \w ridden|strong="H7392"\w* ever since \add I was\add* thine unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*? was I \w ever|strong="H5532"\w* \w wont|strong="H5532"\w* to do \w so|strong="H6213"\w* unto thee? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Nay.\f + \fr 22.30 \ft upon…: Heb. who hast ridden upon me\f*\f + \fr 22.30 \ft ever since…: or, ever since thou wast, etc\f*

Then the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w opened|strong="H1540"\w* the \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* of \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, and he \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w standing|strong="H5324"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w drawn|strong="H8025"\w* in his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and he bowed \w down|strong="H6915"\w* his head, and fell \w flat|strong="H7812"\w* on his \w face|strong="H0639"\w*.  +  r 22.31  t fell…: or, bowed himself *

And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Wherefore hast thou \w smitten|strong="H5221"\w* thine \w ass|strong="H0860"\w* these \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H7272"\w*? behold, I went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w withstand|strong="H7854"\w* thee, because \add thy\add* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* is \w perverse|strong="H3399"\w* before me:\f + \fr 22.32 \ft to…: Heb. to be an adversary unto thee\f*

And the \w ass|strong="H0860"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* me, and \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* from \w me|strong="H6440"\w* these \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H7272"\w*: \w unless|strong="H0194"\w* she had \w turned|strong="H5186"\w* from \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, surely now also I had \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* thee, and saved her \w alive|strong="H2421"\w*.

And \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*; for I \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* not that thou \w stoodest|strong="H5324"\w* in the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* me: now therefore, if it displease \w thee|strong="H7489"\w*, I will get me back \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.\f + \fr 22.34 \ft displease…: Heb. be evil in thine eyes\f*

And the \w angel|strong="H4397"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* with the \w men|strong="H0582"\w*: but \w only|strong="H0657"\w* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that I shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee, that thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*. So \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*.

¶ And when \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* that \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, he went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* him unto a \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w*, which \add is\add* in the \w border|strong="H1366"\w* of \w Arnon|strong="H0769"\w*, which \add is\add* in the \w utmost|strong="H7097"\w* \w coast|strong="H1366"\w*.

And \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, Did I not \w earnestly|strong="H7971"\w* \w send|strong="H7971"\w* unto thee to \w call|strong="H7121"\w* thee? wherefore \w camest|strong="H1980"\w* thou not unto me? am I not \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w indeed|strong="H0552"\w* to promote thee to \w honour|strong="H3513"\w*?

And \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, Lo, I am \w come|strong="H0935"\w* unto thee: have I now any \w power|strong="H3201"\w* at \w all|strong="H3201"\w* to \w say|strong="H1696"\w* any \w thing|strong="H3972"\w*? the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w putteth|strong="H7760"\w* in my \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, that shall I \w speak|strong="H1696"\w*.

And \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w*, and they \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w Kirjath-huzoth|strong="H2351"\w*.\f + \fr 22.39 \ft Kirjath-huzoth: or, a city of streets\f*

And \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w offered|strong="H2076"\w* \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w* and \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, and \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* to \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, and to the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* that \add were\add* with him.

And it came to pass on the \w morrow|strong="H1242"\w*, that \w Balak|strong="H1111"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Balaam|strong="H1109"\w*, and brought him \w up|strong="H5927"\w* into the high \w places|strong="H1116"\w* of \w Baal|strong="H1120"\w*, that thence he might \w see|strong="H7200"\w* the \w utmost|strong="H7097"\w* \add part\add* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
